mapper.select: select r.name from ROLE r left join USER_ROLE ur on r.id=ur.role_id left join USERS u on u.id=ur.user_id where u.delete_flag!=1 and ur.delete_flag!=1 and r.delete_flag!=1 and u.user_name=#{userName}
select * from ROLE r right join BUTTON_PERMISSION bp on r.id=bp.obj_id and bp.type=2 and r.delete_flag!=1 and bp.delete_flag!=1 and bp.button_id=#{buttonId}
select * from ROLE r right join USER_ROLE ur on r.id=ur.role_id and ur.delete_flag!=1 and r.delete_flag!=1 and ur.user_id=#{userId}
